oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dedication of Chattanooga Armory
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Major General T. A. Frazier speaking at the dedication ceremony for the National Guard Armory in Chattanooga.

The Chattanooga armory was erected in 1943 by the State of Tennessee, the City of Chattanooga, Hamilton County, and the Works Progress Administration. Clarence T. Jones was the architect. Governor Cooper's address at the ceremony was broadcast by radio.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tennessee State Guard, 1941-1946
